alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:37PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pender, southern Bladen, southeastern Robeson, north central Brunswick, Columbus, northwestern Florence, Dillon, Darlington, northwestern Horry, northern Marion and southeastern Marlboro Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 836 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clyde to near Kelly. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Hartsville, Marion, Dillon, Darlington, Whiteville, Mullins, Rowan, Tabor City, Timmonsville, Chadbourn, Lake Waccamaw, Latta, Lamar, Fair Bluff, Quinby, Lake View, Northwest, Sandyfield and Sellers. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 126 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina near mile marker 146, and between mile markers 148 and 195. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender; Robeson
